skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. t.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Say the wake word just once and have a natural conversation with ChatGPT. The built in LangChain memory will remember conversational context, manage token usage for longer conversations, and even recall some details in later conversations. Ask ChatGPT questions as it's meant to be, get responses, and engage in natural language conversations on a wide range of topics. Whether you want to have a casual chat, get answers to trivia questions, or have a virtual conversation partner, ChatGPT is here to provide an engaging and interactive experience.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
